body:
And a fourth
https://nhentai.net/g/316101/77/
 seems like there is part in every antology he participated in. Check out the tag of the author.
https://nhentai.net/artist/fuyuichi-monme/

Actually there are more parts then I expected. Here's a third part if anyone is interested :
https://nhentai.net/g/316102/
(its the third story with yukata)

The girl is just so cute. I gotta hand it to this author, his artstyle is great. Nice little story as well, very nice. All in all a decent good quality doujin, though no sex in this first part, there is in the second.

Here's part 2 (in japanese) for my fellow cultured men
https://nhentai.net/g/315808/
